page.title: 15Celebrations!
page.content:
This year Stafford Rangers were champions of the Northern Premier League. They celebrated by having two discos - one to which the public were invited to meet the players - a dinner dance, and a meal at the Swan Hotel.
Their cake was decorated in black and white, the colours of the team. They keep the trophy in the Board Room. Each player was given a silver goblet.
Their player of the year was Peter Carr who was voted for by the supporters.
Next year Stafford Rangers will be in the Gola League which was called the Alliance Premier League.
